name: Sudoku AdFree
description:
Sudoku for android is a classical sudoku game available in Google Play based on open sudoku project http://opensudoku.eu/
Sudoku is the most popular logic-based numbers game.
Game Features:
- With 3 difficulty levels, intuitive interface. This sudoku app is sure to be your favorite.
- Need a break? Don`t worry - exit sudoku, and the puzzle is saved exactly as you see it!
- Pencil
- Funny cats will help you to smile.
